flows.name: yyy_a_Use case - Palo Alto - Allowed High Risk or Remote Access Applications

nodes.name: New_source_activity
nodes.lql:
`select 
CASE WHEN subcategory="remote-access" THEN concat("New remote access activity from source ",source_ip) 
ELSE concat("New high risk activity from source ",source_ip)
END AS alert_title, lhub_score, concat ("APPLICATION:",application,"

SUBCATEGORY: ",subcategory,"

RISK: ",risk,"

EVENT COUNT: ",current_count,"

DESTINATION ADDRESSES: ",concat_ws("; ",dest_addresses)) AS alert_details from join_recent_source_activity_to_historical where _count IS NULL AND lhub_score > 0`

nodes.name: New_user_activity
nodes.lql:
`select 
CASE WHEN subcategory="remote-access" THEN concat("New remote access activity by user ",source_user) 
ELSE concat("New high risk activity by user ",source_user)
END AS alert_title, lhub_score, concat ("APPLICATION:",application,"

SUBCATEGORY: ",subcategory,"

RISK: ",risk,"

EVENT COUNT: ",current_count,"

CONNECTIONS: ",concat_ws("; ",connections)) AS alert_details from join_recent_user_activity_to_historical where _count IS NULL AND lhub_score > 0`

nodes.name: recent_high_risk_user_activity
nodes.lql: `select count(*) AS current_count, collect_set(concat(source_ip,'->',destination_ip)) AS connections from Whitelist_recent_activity where source_user != ''  AND subcategory!='management' GROUP BY source_user,application,subcategory,risk, lhub_score`

nodes.name: Add_reporter_field
nodes.lql: `select *, 'anthony.morris@logichub.com' AS reporter from Join_all_results where lhub_score>= 8`

nodes.name: Smart_Case_Creation_v2
nodes.description: Receives case title and case details. If an open case matches the title, the case details will be appended to the open case. Otherwise, a new case will be created.

nodes.description: Receives case title and case details. If an open case matches the title, the case details will be appended to the open case. Otherwise, a new case will be created.
nodes.title: Smart Case Creation

nodes.name: recent_high_risk_source_activity
nodes.lql: `SELECT count(*) AS current_count, collect_set(destination_ip) AS dest_addresses FROM Whitelist_recent_activity WHERE lhub_score > 0 AND subcategory!='management' GROUP BY source_ip, application, subcategory, risk, lhub_score`

nodes.name: recent_high_risk_destination_activity
nodes.lql: `select count(*) AS current_count, collect_set(source_ip) AS source_addresses from Whitelist_recent_activity where subcategory!='management' GROUP BY destination_ip,application,subcategory, risk, lhub_score`

nodes.name: External_Management_Activity
nodes.lql: `select lhub_score, application, destination_ip, source_user, risk, subcategory, category, source_ip, action, from_unixtime(startTime/1000) AS startTime, from_unixtime(endTime/1000) AS endTime from Whitelist_recent_activity where NOT (source_ip rlike '(^127\.)|(^10\.)|(^172\.1[6-9]\.)|(^172\.2[0-9]\.)|(^172\.3[0-1]\.)|(^192\.168\.)')  AND NOT (destination_ip rlike '(^127\.)|(^10\.)|(^172\.1[6-9]\.)|(^172\.2[0-9]\.)|(^172\.3[0-1]\.)|(^192\.168\.)') AND subcategory='management' AND lhub_score>0`

nodes.name: New_Remote_Management_By_External_System
nodes.lql:
`select concat("New remote management connection to ",destination_ip) AS alert_title, lhub_score, concat ("SOURCE ADDRESS: ",source_ip,"

APPLICATION:",application,"

SUBCATEGORY: ",subcategory,"

RISK: ",risk) AS alert_details from Join_External_Management_Activity_To_historical where _count IS NULL AND lhub_score > 0`

nodes.name: New_destination_activity
nodes.lql:
`select 
CASE WHEN subcategory="remote-access" THEN concat("New remote access activity to destination ",destination_ip) 
ELSE concat("New high risk activity to destination ",destination_ip)
END AS alert_title, lhub_score, concat ("APPLICATION:",application,"

SUBCATEGORY: ",subcategory,"

RISK: ",risk,"

EVENT COUNT: ",current_count,"

SOURCE ADDRESSES: ",concat_ws("; ",source_addresses)) AS alert_details from join_recent_destination_activity_to_historical where _count IS NULL AND lhub_score > 0`

data.query: (_sourceCategory=syslog) ",TRAFFIC," NOT ",url," NOT ",dns," NOT ",not-applicable," NOT ",ntp," NOT ",ssl," NOT ",incomplete," NOT ",ping," NOT ",snmpv3," NOT ",outlook-web-online," NOT ",ldap," NOT ",msrpc-base," NOT ",insufficient-data," NOT ",print-over-ms-smb," NOT ",kerberos," NOT ",sharepoint-online," NOT ",net.tcp," NOT ",snmp-base," NOT ",cygnet-scada," NOT ",ms-ds-smbv3," NOT ",google-base," NOT ",snmpv2," NOT ",stun," NOT ",netbios-ns," | csv _raw extract FUTURE_USE_1, Receive_Time, Serial_Number, Type, Threat_Content_Type, FUTURE_USE_2, Generated_Time, Source_IP, Destination_IP, NAT_Source_IP, NAT_Destination_IP, Rule_Name, Source_User, Destination_User, Application, Virtual_System, Source_Zone, Destination_Zone, Inbound_Interface, Outbound_Interface, Log_Action, FUTURE_USE_3, Session_ID, Repeat_Count, Source_Port, Destination_Port, NAT_Source_Port, NAT_Destination_Port, Flags, Protocol, Action, Bytes, Bytes_Sent, Bytes_Received, Packets, Start_Time, Elapsed_Time, Category, FUTURE_USE_4, Sequence_Number, Action_Flags, Source_Location, Destination_Location, FUTURE_USE_5, Packets_Sent, Packets_Received, Session_End_Reason, Device_Group_Hierarchy_Level_1, Device_Group_Hierarchy_Level_2, Device_Group_Hierarchy_Level_3, Device_Group_Hierarchy_Level_4, Virtual_System_Name, Device_Name, Action_Source, Source_VM_UUID, Destination_VM_UUID, Tunnel_ID_IMSI, Monitor_Tag_IMEI, Parent_Session_ID, Parent_Start_Time, Tunnel_Type, SCTP_Association_ID, SCTP_Chunks, SCTP_Chunks_Sent, SCTP_Chunks_Received|count by Application, source_ip, destination_ip, source_user, Action |where !(source_ip matches "10.*"AND destination_ip matches "10.*") AND Action="allow"

modules.name: Smart Case Creation v2
modules.description: Receives case title and case details. If an open case matches the title, the case details will be appended to the open case. Otherwise, a new case will be created.

templateNodes.name: Collect_Case_Sets
templateNodes.templateLQL: `select collect_set(result__status) as caseDisposition, collect_set(concat(result__id,":",result__status)) AS caseCollection from parse_dedupe_key_from_cases GROUP BY result__title, lh__module_dedupe_key `

templateNodes.name: simulate_output
templateNodes.templateLQL:
`SELECT lhub_score, '-' AS case_id, nextAction,
PRINTF('Not run in a batch, so output simulated\n%s',
CASE nextAction WHEN 'newCase' THEN 'New case would have been created' ELSE PRINTF('Would have added a comment to case %s', REGEXP_REPLACE(ELEMENT_AT(caseCollection, 1), ':.*', '')) END
) AS result
FROM if_not_run_in_a_batch`

templateNodes.name: Append_To_Cases_Final
templateNodes.templateLQL: `SELECT "reporter" AS reporter, *, concat_ws(', ', slice(caseSplit, 0, 1)) AS caseToAppendTo FROM Append_To_Cases_Split`

templateNodes.name: Module_StartChild1
templateNodes.templateLQL:
`select L.lhub_score, L.case_reporter_within_module, L.case_title_within_module, L.case_description_within_module, L.lhub_execution_metadata, L.lh__module_dedupe_key, R.result__title, R.caseDisposition, R.caseCollection
from Module_Start L
LEFT JOIN Collect_Case_SetsChild1 R
ON L.case_title_within_module=R.result__title `

templateNodes.name: Append_To_Cases_Filter_Done
templateNodes.templateLQL: `SELECT * FROM Append_To_Cases_Step1 WHERE NOT col REGEXP ":done"`

templateNodes.name: Module_Start
templateNodes.templateLQL:
`select *, "%%%reporter%%%" AS case_reporter_within_module,
%%%case_title%%% as case_title_within_module,
%%%case_description%%% as case_description_within_module
from reformat_dedupe_key`

templateNodes.name: Determine_Next_Action
templateNodes.templateLQL: `SELECT *, CASE WHEN array_contains(caseDisposition, "todo") THEN "Append To Case" WHEN array_contains(caseDisposition, "inprogress") THEN "Append To Case" ELSE "newCase" END AS nextAction FROM Module_StartChild1`

templateNodes.name: Get_Create_New_Case_Results
templateNodes.templateLQL: `select lhub_score, GET_JSON_OBJECT(result, "$.id") AS case_id, nextAction, result from Create_New_Cases`

templateNodes.name: Add_Required_Case_Fields
templateNodes.templateLQL:
`select *,
"reporter" AS reporter,
"todo" AS status,
"Low" as priority,
TO_JSON(ARRAY(MAP("id", "lh_dedupe_key", "value", lh__module_dedupe_key))) AS dedupekey_input
FROM Determine_Which_Alerts_Need_New_Cases`

templateNodes.name: Append_To_Cases_Step1
templateNodes.templateLQL: `SELECT *, explode(caseCollection) FROM if_run_in_a_batch WHERE nextAction = "Append To Case"`

templateNodes.name: parse_dedupe_key_from_cases
templateNodes.templateLQL: `select result__id, result__status, result__title, GET_JSON_OBJECT(result, PRINTF("$.fields[%s].value", ARRAY_POSITION(FROM_JSON(GET_JSON_OBJECT(result, "$.fields[*].displayName"), 'array<string>'), "lh_dedupe_key") - 1)) AS lh__module_dedupe_key, result from fail_if_detail_fetch_fails`

templateNodes.name: Get_Append_To_Case_Results
templateNodes.templateLQL: `select lhub_score, GET_JSON_OBJECT(result, "$.caseId") AS case_id, nextAction, result from Append_To_Cases_ACTION`

templateNodes.name: final_check_for_errors
templateNodes.templateLQL:
`SELECT *,
CASE WHEN case_id = '-' OR GET_JSON_OBJECT(result, "$.has_error") = false THEN '' 
ELSE PRINTF('%s (%s)',
CASE
    WHEN GET_JSON_OBJECT(result, "$.error") != '' THEN GET_JSON_OBJECT(result, "$.error")
    ELSE "Case management integration failed, but no error provided" END,
nextAction)
END AS error
FROM join_outputs`

templateNodes.name: check_for_errors_in_case_search
templateNodes.templateLQL:
`SELECT *,
CASE WHEN GET_JSON_OBJECT(result, "$.has_error") = false THEN '' 
ELSE PRINTF('Integration failure while searching existing cases: %s',
CASE
    WHEN GET_JSON_OBJECT(result, "$.error") != '' THEN GET_JSON_OBJECT(result, "$.error")
    ELSE "Case management integration failed, but no error provided" END)
END AS error
FROM Get_All_Previous_Cases`

templateNodes.name: check_for_errors_while_fetching_details
templateNodes.templateLQL:
`SELECT *,
CASE WHEN GET_JSON_OBJECT(result, "$.has_error") = false THEN '' 
ELSE PRINTF('Integration failure while fetching case details: %s',
CASE
    WHEN GET_JSON_OBJECT(result, "$.error") != '' THEN GET_JSON_OBJECT(result, "$.error")
    ELSE "Case management integration failed, but no error provided" END)
END AS error2
FROM get_case_details`

modules.name: Smart Case Creation (v1 OLD)
modules.description: Preserving temporarily in case we need to revert back from v2; otherwise do not use.

templateNodes.name: Collect_Case_Sets
templateNodes.templateLQL: `select collect_set(result__status) as caseDisposition, collect_set(concat(result__id,":",result__status)) AS caseCollection from filter_out_closed_cases GROUP BY result__title `

templateNodes.name: Determine_Next_Action
templateNodes.templateLQL: `SELECT *, CASE WHEN array_contains(caseDisposition, "todo") THEN "Append To Case" WHEN array_contains(caseDisposition, "inprogress") THEN "Append To Case" ELSE "newCase" END AS nextAction FROM Module_StartChild1 WHERE GET_JSON_OBJECT(lhub_execution_metadata, '$.batch_url') != ''`

templateNodes.name: Add_Required_Case_Fields
templateNodes.templateLQL: `select "%%%reporter%%%" AS reporter, "todo" AS status, "Low" as priority, * from Determine_Which_Alerts_Need_New_Cases`

templateNodes.name: Append_To_Cases_Step1
templateNodes.templateLQL: `SELECT *, explode(caseCollection) FROM Determine_Next_Action WHERE nextAction = "Append To Case"`

templateNodes.name: Append_To_Cases_Filter_Done
templateNodes.templateLQL: `SELECT * FROM Append_To_Cases_Step1 WHERE NOT col REGEXP ":done"`

templateNodes.name: Append_To_Cases_Final
templateNodes.templateLQL: `SELECT "%%%reporter%%%" AS reporter, *, concat_ws(', ', slice(caseSplit, 0, 1)) AS caseToAppendTo FROM Append_To_Cases_Split`

templateNodes.name: Module_StartChild1
templateNodes.templateLQL:
`select L.case_reporter_within_module, L.case_title_within_module, L.case_description_within_module, L.lhub_execution_metadata, R.result__title, R.caseDisposition, R.caseCollection
from Module_Start L
LEFT JOIN Collect_Case_SetsChild1 R
ON L.case_title_within_module=R.result__title `

templateNodes.name: Module_Start
templateNodes.templateLQL: `select *, %%%reporter%%% as case_reporter_within_module, %%%case_title%%% as case_title_within_module, %%%case_description%%% as case_description_within_module from reformat_dedupe_key`
